channel.title: A scammer warning
channel.description: guys, if a jesse searles contacts you on skype dont do any coding for him... i coded his LEECHED PDF source and he told me to change it to CHRONIC SCAPE so i did, i asked him for somethign in return (a piece of code) and he said ok... wen i finished coding i sent to him and he blocked me on skype...... so ya, just dont trust him and chronic scape is leeched gf him.....

item.title: A scammer warning
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

what type of leech? Like a lake leech or sea leech or space leech?

Read full topic

item.title: A scammer warning
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:7, topic:416841”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=518780.msg3770257#msg3770257 date=1317599862]

The number one rule on this site is that we don’t sell anything here (other then SCAR scripts but thats dead) since you broke the rules I feel you learned a lesson here and why we have that rule.

What was the point of the scar script exception you could still scam couldn’t you?

scar scripts were used for botting i think
[/quote]
Yes they were.

Boy, were those the days… :rolleyes:[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: A scammer warning
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

reyx7:

Oh no, you lost your chronic PI server…

dude those things are like worth millions wtf u saying

at topic dude dont listen to these guys keep fightin until u get ur serber bak its one in a million!!!

Read full topic

item.title: A scammer warning
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:5, topic:416841”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=518780.msg3770174#msg3770174 date=1317597022]
The number one rule on this site is that we don’t sell anything here (other then SCAR scripts but thats dead) since you broke the rules I feel you learned a lesson here and why we have that rule.
[/quote]
What was the point of the scar script exception you could still scam couldn’t you?[/quote]

Your script needed to be approved inorder to sell it.

Read full topic
